title: Disconect, Apparently im not connected to the internet.
body: This Stupid connection problem hasn't been fixed after a few days now. The first time I noticed this, It disconnected me mid game and wouldn't let me back in despite me having perfect internet connect and NO FIREWALL INTERCEPTING IT! This has resulted in me losing 2 ranked games including today when it didn't connect me into game. It also wouldn't let me in an ARAM Earlier either. PLease fix this asap, I'm trying my hardest to climb and the last thing I need is servers not connecting me for whatever reason. PLEASE! I'm sure I'm not the only one with this problem either.

replies.body: It just did it again, and Now ive got 5 game restriction for low priority que for 5 minutes. Please fix your servers or guide me to resolving this issue. I know 100% for sure its NOT A FIREWALL!!!!!!

I had the same issue and found out that my net was having problems authenticating a connection, if you're still encountering this issue I'd give your ISP (Internet Service Provider) a call and they will guide you to a fix
yeah I've had this the last 3 days, been completely unable to play any League at all which is a real bummer. No response from Mr Rito James so far.... not sure what's going on
